column5: On the 3 bank Motomaster Nautilus battery charger you have to select the type of battery it is. #1 is AGM,#2 is Gell cell and # 3 is Regular flooded, which one of these is a deepcycle battery. Can't find it in the instructions????????????Thanks.
a deep cycle can come in all 3 flavours. if yours has the caps on top that you can remove to top off the water inside, it is a flooded.  if it is an optima, it is gel.

well it could be any of the 3 but I will guess number 3..normal wet battery because 2 is every every every expensive  there are agm batteries that are deepcycle but you would know if that's what you bought, optima blue top are agm batteries
nice to have a question answered eh Larry ?
